title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled frontend developer to join our remote team. The ideal candidate should be proficient in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

title: UI Engineer
description: As a UI Engineer, you will be responsible for creating intuitive user interfaces using Figma and implementing designs in React and CSS.

title: Backend Developer
description: We need a backend developer skilled in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to help build our scalable cloud solutions.

title: System Administrator
description: Looking for an experienced system administrator to manage and maintain our IT infrastructure.
